channel.title: Allow user bars for a more personalized profile
channel.description:
[center][u][b]There is no room for more, please don't post in this thread suggesting something bigger. You either use this or you dont.[/b][/u] [/center]
Id like to propose that we, for the first time ever, allow userbars on the forums in members signatures.
THIS IS NOT WHAT I MEAN. We aren't a forum ran by incompetent 12 year olds who let everything get trashy, heres a good example of why sigs suck:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/gq3Ww.jpg[/img]
This is what I mean:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/UaISM.jpg[/img]
+'s It wont bog down your page loading time it wont cause the page to upscale as they load It will fuel the graphics section It will allow members to customize their profile in a nice little spot without giving them hard to moderate avatars
Of course only 1 per sig, and if possible make it so if you have a userbar you have a smaller text limit, and make sure userbars always display at the top of your signature.
this would be the size limit [img]http://i.imgur.com/0bklF.jpg[/img]
If not we allow both and see how it goes.

item.title: Allow user bars for a more personalized profile
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

I am now against my own suggestion. After alot of thought I realized these would almost look like mini ads all over the page and some extreme colors would clash and it really would look like trash.

We are still trying to push personalizing, just not down this route, sorry guys.

Read full topic
item.source: Allow user bars for a more personalized profile

item.title: Allow user bars for a more personalized profile
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:62, topic:444733”][quote author=Ruby Forums Coder link=topic=547420.msg4014359#msg4014359 date=1339492868]
Instead of enabling these userbars, why not just enable avatars? This will allow the same colour and friendliness to the community.
[/quote]
crowds the postbit, that and custom titles have been traditionally given out to specific people[/quote]

Yeah, but I still believe it would look better than these user bar’s in signature space, I think they’d just look out of place.

Read full topic

item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Davidi2:

Just looking at the list of Moparians I can see quite a few people that I would not want to have the user bar…

Anyways, it would be a good idea to “spruce” up the forums and like Frell said I doubt it give much of a load on the server considering how many people would have it.

Read full topic

PS Frell there are many ways people try to (and succeed) get away with spamming, such as posting generic replies to topics after just reading a tiny bit of it (“looks good, keep up the good work” etc)

item.title: Allow user bars for a more personalized profile
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Frell:

Nope. 1k is reachable too soon. 7k takes a long time and TRYING to get to 7k will get you in trouble because its very noticeable.

Well about 12 people have >7k posts, so making the requirement 7k posts would be totally reasonable
/sarcasm

But seriously, if spamming 1k posts isn’t noticeable, your brain must be dead.

Read full topic

item.source: Allow user bars for a more personalized profile

item.title: Allow user bars for a more personalized profile
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:50, topic:444733”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=547420.msg4014105#msg4014105 date=1339467166]

Adding userbars wont turn this place into a dump like RL or RS, you have to go way out of your way to let that happen.

but adding userbars will increase the load time to the site 10 fold and it adds absolutely no benefit.

Once theyre cached itll be fast, and like t4 said its 2012…

@David, Taharok proposed the idea of only letting Moparians use userbars, which I personally think is a great idea. What is your take on that? They wouldn’t be super frequently on pages but theyd show up more often than avatars.
[/quote]I don’t like anything like that based on post count, it just encourages spam.

i don’t think someone is going to spam 1k or so posts just to be able to put a userbar in their signature…[/quote]Welcome to Moparscape.

Read full topic
